pages.text: $(li)Biotite Block is a new decorative block.$(br)$(li)It can be used to save Biotite in a more efficient way.

$(li)It can be used to craft Biotite Bricks, Ender Watcher, Biotite Slabs, Biotite Stairs, Biotite Walls and Biotite Pillars in a Crafting Table.$(br)$(li)You can obtain Smooth Biotite block Smelting a Block of Biotite in a Furnace or Kiln.$(br)$(li)It can be placed in a Stonecutting to make other decorative blocks.
